subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A new DVR [7 Attachments]
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0015_01C9C18B.02543DE0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

You have to tell how much and were to get one. I need a new DVR for my nigh=
t vision cameras. I need to be able to hook an external mic to it as well, =
as the cameras do not have audio capability. I was going to buy the Radio S=
hack one as someone suggested to me. Which would be fine, but I would reall=
y like to have USB connection.

Does it have an internal harddrive?

April
=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: grassharp@ya=
hoogroups.com ; evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, April 19, 2009 9:4=
3 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] A new DVR [7 Attachments]


  [Attachment(s) from=
 Frank Sumption included below] 



  I bought a Radio Shack digital recore=
d years, and never liked it much. I picked up an Olympus WS-21S this aftern=
oon on a whim. I made a line to mic adapter, and did a couple box recording=
s. I don't know, might be better than tape. I has the advantage of of built=
 in USB connector, and it records in WMA format. 

   I tried a short recor=
ding last night using the tones in 51, I don't think they help. 

   Frank-=
S
